title: Our golden heritage
creator_credit: Film Partnership (Vic.) and Australian Dairy Board
brief_description: Traces the early methods of making butter, capturing something of the simplicity of Australia’s early history. From here the scene moves to the modern interior of a dairy factory showing buttermakers and packers at work. To conclude, some examples of the ways butter can be used in cooking are shown.
